components.description: Analyze different cultural measurements of time.
Explain how the rise of civilizations defines eras in world history in two or more regions of the world.
Explain how the rise of civilizations defines two or more eras.

standards.title: Understands and analyzes causal factors that have shaped major events in history.

components.description: Explain and analyze how individuals, movements, cultural and ethnic groups, and technology from past civilizations have shaped world history.

standards.title: Understands that there are multiple perspectives and interpretations of historical events.

components.description: Analyze and interpret historical materials from a variety of perspectives in world history.
Analyze multiple causal factors to create and support a claim about major events in world history.

standards.title: Understands how historical events inform analysis of contemporary issues and events.

components.description: Analyze how a historical event in world history helps us to understand contemporary issues and events.
